beer.beer_description:
Light in colour, with prominent floral and ginger notes that mellow into a gentle sweet bitterness.

The perfect Valentine celebration beer.
A Valentine beer brewed with malted barley, pinhead oats and a marriage of English and Continental hops.

Available during February on draught and throughout the year in bottles.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 380 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 77!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly whats on tap! That's 105 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 22!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 180 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 37!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 200 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 41.

items.checkin_comment:
Surprised that it's been 5 years since I last had this. I should buy it more often, it is very good. Trouble is, Harvey's do so many other great beers! 
It's quite sweet. Floral, hoppy, a little bitter. A very pale colour but a surprisingly sturdy body.

user.bio: I just love beer. I drink too much of it but hey, a little of what you like does you good. Right?

items.comment: Wish I found  more of their beers here. In the States. Nice tasting  notes, my friend. Have a good weekend.

user.bio: I just love beer. I drink too much of it but hey, a little of what you like does you good. Right?

items.comment:
Butch B. Likewise mate. Have a great weekend! And thanks!
TBH, they're quite hard to find outside of their local area.
There's one store locally that does a range of their beers but generally I pop down to the brewery about once/maybe twice a year and...

user.bio: I just love beer. I drink too much of it but hey, a little of what you like does you good. Right?

items.comment:
..pick some bottles up. The brewery (unusually) do a returns deal on their bottles. A little money off the beer.
They stock some amazing whiskies too but I'm not "allowed" to buy any at the moment as I already have about 18 different ones on the go.

user.bio: Music connoisseur (ambient, tribal, drone and deep space), plus some craft beer (mostly IPA related styles)...
Crawley born. Norfolk emigre. If its beer itll most likely get a score over 4.

Donated $3k to Ukraine so far
Trying to visit all Oregon breweries in 1 year to raise money and awareness
Let me know if
I rarely rate beers, but leave detailed tasting notes. Happily check-in repeats.

Bigdaddybeerman on instagram
Larsanderson64 on twitter

Pittsburgh Steelers, N.Y. Rangers & N.Y. Mets super fan. 
Instagram: jeffm.4
Mostly cans at home, cheap cask at spoons & craft at head of steam
